page.title: 20GREATFIELD PARK,CHELTENHAM
page.content: I live in Greatfield Park,a new estate in Hatherley,Cheltenham.My road is called Timperley Way.There are many other roads and cul_de_sacs being built such as Pyrton Mews & Calverley Mews which are both cul_de_sacs and Runnymede which is an ordinary road. When the building of Greatfield Park began there was only one access but as the building moved on another access was made and this time a big road was joined on.Then the first road was cut off and the only way out of the estate was to go down the long road and out on to Greatfield Lane.The estate was started in 1983 and before this the houses opposite had a good view across open fields so the building was not very popular with some people.Even so, there is still quite a beautiful view of Leckhampton Hill from anywhere in Greatfield Park.I like our new house!
